answers.b: any quantity in which the ratio of two numbers is 2.0.
answers.c: any quantity which is represented by the natural logarithm of the measured quantity with respect to the reference quantity.
answers.d: any quantity which is represented as 10 times the logarithm of the measured quantity with respect to the reference signal.

questions.question: Two automobile whistles of 100 dB are blown at the same time. Their resultant SPL would be

answers.a: the lowest pressure fluctuation normally discernible by human beings

questions.question: The SPL corresponding to one atmospheric pressure (1.013 bar) is
The sound pressure level of a sound source at double the distance would
